item.title: Weed growing up through wall and attracting litter dumping, 22nd June
item.description:
There is a large weed growing in the north east corner of the lawn by the side of the Gateway estate and the boundary wall with the rear gardens of Fielding Street. This is attracting the dumping of rubbish and it also looks to be growing through the wall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gateway, Walworth, London
